events.name: click
events.description: Emitted on QChip click if 'clickable' property is set
events.description_zh: 如果设置了 'clickable' 属性，则在 QChip 单击时发出

events.name: update:selected
events.description: Used by Vue on 'v-model:selected' for updating its value
events.description_zh: 被 Vue 在 'v-model：selected' 上用于更新其值

events.name: remove
events.description: Works along with 'value' and 'removable' prop. Emitted when toggling rendering state of the QChip
events.description_zh: 与 'value' 和 'removable' prop 一起使用。在切换 QChip 的渲染状态时发出

size.description: QChip size name or a CSS unit including unit name
size.description_zh: QChip 大小名称或包含单元名称的 CSS 单元

label.description: Chip's content as string; overrides default slot if specified
label.description_zh: Chip 的内容为 string;如果指定，则覆盖默认插槽

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for text color of QCarousel button controls (arrows, navigation) from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

v-model.description: Model of the component determining if QChip should be rendered or not
v-model.description_zh: 确定是否应呈现 QChip 的组件模型
v-model.desc: Model of the component determining if QChip should be rendered or not

selected.description: Model for QChip if it's selected or not
selected.description_zh: QChip 的模型（如果已选中）

square.description: Sets a low value for border-radius instead of the default one, making it close to a square
square.description_zh: 为 border-radius 设置一个较低的值，而不是默认值，使其接近正方形
square.desc: Sets a low value for border-radius instead of the default one, making it close to a square

clickable.description: Is QChip clickable? If it's the case, then it will add hover effects and emit 'click' events
clickable.description_zh: QChip 是可点击的吗？如果是这种情况，那么它将添加悬停效果并发出 'click' 事件

removable.description: If set, then it displays a 'remove' icon that when clicked the QChip emits 'remove' event
removable.description_zh: 如果设置，则会显示一个 'remove' 图标，当单击 QChip 时，会发出 'remove' 事件

remove-aria-label.description: aria-label to be used on the remove icon
remove-aria-label.description_zh: aria-label 用于 Remove 图标

slots.name: default
slots.description: This is where QChip content goes, if not using 'label' property
slots.description_zh: 这就是 QChip 内容的位置，如果不使用 'label' 属性
